page.title: 02220th. Boys' Brigade Company
page.content: The 220th. Boys' Brigade Company meets in Langside Primary School in Tantallon Road every Friday night at 7 o'clock. We start our activities with a company inspection. The company consists of 4 squads of privates, one captain, two lieutenents and one warrent officer about thirty in all. After this we have twenty minutes of physical training. This is followed by one hour of badge work which includes such things as drill,fire prevention and first aid. The evening ends with a period of games. The Boys' Brigade also meets on a Sunday morning for Bible class. About one third of the boys in the company play musical instruments.
